attacks.name: Ignite
attacks.description: Sets the target on fire, dealing mild fire damage.

attacks.name: Ember Burst
attacks.description: Releases a burst of embers that deals mild fire damage.

attacks.name: Frostbite
attacks.description: Freezes the target, dealing mild ice damage.

attacks.name: Ice Shard
attacks.description: Fires a small shard of ice, dealing mild ice damage to the target.

attacks.name: Spark
attacks.description: Releases a small spark of lightning, dealing mild thunder damage.

attacks.name: Shocking Grasp
attacks.description: Delivers a shock to the target, dealing mild thunder damage and might paralyze them temporarily.

attacks.name: Gust
attacks.description: A simple blast of wind that deals mild damage to a single target.

attacks.name: Cyclone Slash
attacks.description: Charges the user's hand with wind, launching enemies into the air on hit dealing mild wind damage that might cause bleeding

attacks.name: Shadow Bolt
attacks.description: A bolt of dark energy that deals low dark damage to a single target.

attacks.name: Dark Strike
attacks.description: Cloaks the user into a veil of darkness to launch a surprise attack dealing mild dark damage that might cause fear
